column1: Smoque BBQ////The food is really good
column2: but I think the portion size for the sides are really small for the price. My husband would need to order about 4 mac and cheese to make one service. You get a portion that is maybe 1/2 cup size. Â The pulled pork is out of this world! I am also not a fan of the inside seating it is community seating style so if you want a private conversation or date night sitting inside is not for you.
